content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
### Iron Smelting Furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace that converts iron ore and coal into iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at position (-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace that converts copper ore and coal into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• Incorrect get_entities usage  
 – When calling get_entities, avoid unsupported keyword arguments (e.g., “radius”) and do not pass positional arguments if none are expected. Verify the function’s parameter requirements before calling.

• Lab placement and iteration issues  
 – Before placing a Lab, confirm that a Lab is available in the inventory.  
 – When retrieving Lab entities, use a fallback such as an empty list if the call returns None to prevent iteration errors.

• Lab crafting ingredient shortfalls  
 – Several Lab crafting attempts failed due to missing sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables).  
 – Ensure that all prerequisite resources and intermediate products are available in sufficient quantities before attempting Lab crafting.
